name: sit-stand-move
description: A timer for getting up from your desk
author: Sally Young <sally@justafish.co.uk>

scripts.build: yarn run babel -- src -d dist --presets react,es2015,stage-2 && yarn run browserify -- dist/app/app.js -o dist/bundle.js -d && yarn run electron-packager -- . moveme --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.0 --icon=Icon.icns
